response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $10,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am offering the product to you at a special price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent chance to acquire a high-quality item at a slightly reduced rate. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
